egg-roll documentation
======================

Welcome to the egg-roll documentation!

This is the official documentation of egg-roll by Renz Jared G. Rolle, a simple terminal-based game developed in Python for the course CS 11, University of the Philippines Diliman.

This project is also available on Github.
More on https://github.com/renzjared/egg-roll

(Last updated 07 January 2025.)

Game Description
----------------------
Egg Roll is a 2D puzzle game where players tilt a grid to guide eggs into their nests. Navigate through walls, avoid frying pans, and use strategic moves to score points. Each level presents a unique challenge with a limited number of moves. The goal of the player is to score the most points.


Features
-------------------

- Easy to understand and maintain.
- Supports language localization.
- Thorough and comprehensive test cases.
- More on GitHub!
